thread.title: Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium
thread.title_full: Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium

title: Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium
text:
> Top News Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium New York Mets pitchers Steven Matz, left, Jacob deGrom, center, and Jonathon Niese talk during a workout at Citi Field, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015 in New York. The Mets will play the Los Angeles Dodgers in a National League Division Series starting Friday in Los Angeles.. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
